content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
We ordered three of the Tripe Soon Tofu and most of the tripe in all three soups tasted like dish soap.It also had a strand of what looked like pig hair on the tripe.It was absolutely disgusting...I'm really disappointed because this was my favorite place.
